meta.content: Front Page; New York and Region
meta.name: online_sections

block.p: Mexican Leader's Mission President-elect Vicente Fox Quesada, in Washington today, will draw on the experience of his home state in asking Americans to help change relations along the border.
Mexican Leader's Mission President-elect Vicente Fox Quesada, in Washington today, will draw on the experience of his home state in asking Americans to help change relations along the border.
Curbing Alcohol at Festivals New York City officials have backed off a proposal to ban alcohol sales at street festivals, but will cut in half the number of such vendors at the Feast of San Gennaro.
Last Phone Workers Settle The last remaining strikers reached a deal with Verizon Communications to end an 18-day walkout after the company agreed to reduce mandatory overtime.
